original_text: Much food is in the tillage of the poor: but there is that is destroyed for want of judgment.
korean_text: 가난한 자는 밭을 경작함으로 양식이 많아지거니와 불의로 말미암아 가산을 탕진하는 자가 있느니라

sentences.original_text: Much food is in the tillage of the poor
sentences.korean_translation: 가난한 사람의 경작지에는 많은 양식이 있다

sentences.original_text: but there is that is destroyed
